name: Colziand
startIntroPart1: Oh Raymond! You who formed a nation of people for God to saved, glorious you are. Thanks be to the mighty Father, you've united people from different places and colors. Lastly the rule which is far beyond greater than any empire, so this empire of empire is not like any other.
startIntroPart2: Quotes: 'Here starts the rule in which it will lead us to the bright future', 'Our expanse is going further beyond the horizon skies of fate', 'Long it has started and now it still continues, our Lord leads us' - Colziand King. Will you once more rule the world for the Lord's desire.
attacked: I'm dissapointed! Why declare destruction, is there no fun in peace and prosperity?
defeated: Colziand is its people, me, and Him.
introduction: Kumusta sa'inyo. O estranghero, saan ka galing?
hateHello: You speak in pride, I don't wanna hear it
tradeRequest: It appears that you have a golden interest of our goods
uniques: City-State Influence recovers at twice the normal rate
City-State territory always counts as friendly territory
Military Units gifted from City-States start with [+100] XP
[-10]% Culture cost of adopting new Policies

name: Israel
startIntroPart1: Servant of God; David. Your are the one who lead the Israelites after Saul failed God, you are popular for your act on killing the giant Goliath with just a sling and a stone. With a whole heart for God, you started to build the temple of God in which your son, Solomon the wise was able to finished.
startIntroPart2: Oh famous king, ancestor of Jesus and child of God. Lead His kingdom once more so that the world may come to know Him.
attacked: The Lord presented me your plans. We are prepared!
defeated: Is this how my peaceful reign ends? In a river of blood and suffering...
introduction: I am David, King of the Chosen People. If you seek justice or advice, know that you had found them.
hateYes: The Lord told me it will be wise to accept this offer.
afterPeace: Praise the Lord as he gives peace!
tradeRequest: I present you this trade offer.
uniques: [+1 Culture, +1 Production, +1 Faith] per [4] population [in all cities]
